title: Textile, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printing on plain weave
dimensions:
H x W: 114.3 x 46 cm (45 in. x 18 1/8 in.)
Repeat H x W: 99 x 35.9 cm (39 in. x 14 1/8 in.)
description: Allover pattern of long flowering branches which hook together to form a continuous very linear pattern on the white cotton fabric. Flowers include sweet peas, morning glories, clover, and yarrow.
